dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Devito is a Python package to implement optimized stencil computation.
(e.g., finite differences, image processing, machine learning) from
high-level symbolic problem definitions. Devito builds on SymPy and
employs automated code generation and just-in-time compilation to
execute optimized computational kernels on several computer platforms,
including CPUs, GPUs, and clusters thereof.
dependent_to.name: py-devito

dependent_to.description:
Formulaic is a high-performance implementation of Wilkinson formulas for
Python.
dependent_to.name: py-formulaic

dependent_to.description:
Validates fully-qualified domain names against RFC 1123, so that they
are acceptable to modern bowsers.
dependent_to.name: py-fqdn

dependent_to.description:
Signatures for entire Python programs. Extract the structure, the frame,
the skeleton of your project, to generate API documentation or find
breaking changes in your API.
dependent_to.name: py-griffe

dependent_to.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.
dependent_to.name: py-h5py

dependent_to.description:
Pygit2 is a set of Python bindings to the libgit2 shared library,
libgit2 implements the core of Git.
dependent_to.name: py-pygit2

description: A decorator for caching properties in classes.
name: py-cached-property

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
